tweet.text: Writing back from Beijing in May 1975, George Bush reports he and #BarbaraBush "are happy out here. We feel we are most fortunate to be [...] in this fascinating land" https://t.co/80ODaN18Ew 📷 @Bush41Library https://t.co/AUJjReYFZX
